item.description: I'm curious whether this article is meaningful to non-Emacs users. The benefits certainly are, but the nomenclature could be a hurdle. https://www.masteringemacs.org/article/keyboard-shortcuts-every-command-line-hacker-should-know-about-gnu-readline #Emacs #cli
